artist: Painter: After Salvator Rosa; Engraver: Richard Earlom; Publisher: John Boydell
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Sal: Rosa pinx   R. Earlom fecit/ DAVID and GOLIATH/ From the Original Picture by Salvator Rosa, / in the collection of his Grace the Duke of Devonshire/ (rest of inscription trimmed off)]; on sheet in pencil: [1-374]
title: David and Goliath
